# IKnxAddress.IsBroadcast method

Checks whether the provided Address is an [`IndividualAddress`](../../Tiveria.Home.Knx.Primitives/IndividualAddress.md) for broadcast

```csharp
public bool IsBroadcast()
```

## Return Value

True in case of a broadcast message
